channel.title: landing pages on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in landing pages on Damien Saunders

item.title: HOW TO use WordPress and design a custom landing page
item.description: WordPress may just be one ofthe best solution for building a web and mobile site. One feature is that a user can create static pages that integrate or fit in with the theme of the site. Here is the easy and quick solution for how to create a custom template and have a fresh new look for landing pages or static pages. In fact WordPress has a lot of features that make it easy to use as a CMS – content management system and static pages are important.
